entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Anthony
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:21 AM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Anthony Airport 04:25 AM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: NNE 21 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to wet snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm south of Hare Bay. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm south of Hare Bay. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
